title: However, for the additional FSI availed by payming premium, additional built-up area for economic activities shall be provided @ 10%
clause_text: However, for the additional FSI availed by payming premium, additional built-up area for economic activities shall be provided @ 10%.
section: Public Assembly Facilities :- Town Hall and / or Auditorium including Library
